mapper.select: select id, update_date, cashout, ctime, nodenum from nprox.xch_day where id = #{id}
select id, update_date, cashout, ctime, nodenum from nprox.xch_day limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into nprox.xch_day(update_date, cashout, ctime, nodenum) values (#{update_date}, #{cashout}, #{ctime}, #{nodenum})

insert into nprox.xch_day(update_date, cashout, ctime, nodenum) values
(#{entity.update_date}, #{entity.cashout}, #{entity.ctime}, #{entity.nodenum})

insert into nprox.xch_day(update_date, cashout, ctime, nodenum) values
(#{entity.update_date}, #{entity.cashout}, #{entity.ctime}, #{entity.nodenum})
on duplicate key update update_date = values(update_date) , cashout = values(cashout) , ctime = values(ctime) , nodenum = values(nodenum)
mapper.update:
update nprox.xch_day
update_date = #{update_date},
cashout = #{cashout},
ctime = #{ctime},
nodenum = #{nodenum},
where id = #{id}
